ing: 1 stalk celery, cut into 1/2 inch pieces
3/4 pound kielbasa sausage, sliced into 1/2 inch pieces
1 (10.75 ounce) can  condensed cream of chicken soup
des: "A hearty and quick meal or side dish. If you desire a thicker soup (I do), add a milk and flour mixture, and let simmer until desired thickness. Enjoy!"
ins: In a large pot over medium heat, combine potatoes, onion, celery, beef broth, chicken broth, and water.  Bring to a boil, then reduce heat and simmer until potatoes are tender, 15 minutes.  Stir in sausage and condensed soup and continue to simmer until heated though and slightly thickened.  Season with pepper.  Serve hot.
